title: Lazy Ol’ Moon
description: Curly is caught red-handed taking the pie off Miz McGraw’s window sill and soon blames the full moon for his troubles.
quote: Don’t blame that moon. She can’t do nothing but shine.
altHero: Hobie Doyle plays guitar and sings on a moonlit night
alt1: establishing shot of the cookhouse and a big watering trough
alt2: an older fellow, Curly, yells at the moon
alt3: the moon’s reflection in the watering trough
alt4: Miz McGraw daydreams out the cookhouse window
